doc-example.doc-descr:
There are two diferrent type of instruction for each excercise.
Technical instruction - used to instruct student how to deal with different type of controls - entered in instrs-str attribute
General instruction - used to instruct student what to do with excercise (what to anwser, how many time does he have atc.) - entered in instr-title attribute
doc-example.p: General instruction in this excercise instr-title="Excercise with instructions"
